find_next_available() { find_next_available() {

} }
write_rule() { write_rule() {
local match="$1" local match="$1"
local link="$2" local link="$2"
local comment="$3" local comment="$3"
{ {
if [ "$PRINT_HEADER" ]; then if [ "$PRINT_HEADER" ]; then
PRINT_HEADER= PRINT_HEADER=
echo "# This file was automatically generated by the $0" echo "# This file was automatically generated by the $0"
echo "# program, run by the cd-aliases-generator.rules rules echo "# program, run by the cd-aliases-generator.rules rule
file." s file."
echo "#" echo "#"
echo "# You can modify it, as long as you keep each rule on echo "# You can modify it, as long as you keep each rule on
a single" a single"
echo "# line, and set the \$GENERATED variable." echo "# line, and set the \$GENERATED variable."
echo "" echo ""
fi fi
[ "$comment" ] && echo "# $comment" [ "$comment" ] && echo "# $comment"
echo "$match, SYMLINK+=\"$link\", ENV{GENERATED}=\"1\"" echo "$match, SYMLINK+=\"$link\", ENV{GENERATED}=\"1\""
} >> $RULES_FILE } >> $RULES_FILE
SYMLINKS="$SYMLINKS $link" SYMLINKS="$SYMLINKS $link"
} }
if [ -z "$DEVPATH" ]; then if [ -z "$DEVPATH" ]; then
echo "Missing \$DEVPATH." >&2 echo "Missing \$DEVPATH." >&2
exit 1 exit 1
fi fi
if [ -z "$ID_CDROM" ]; then if [ -z "$ID_CDROM" ]; then
echo "$DEVPATH is not a CD reader." >&2 echo "$DEVPATH is not a CD reader." >&2
exit 1 exit 1
fi fi
if [ "$1" ]; then if [ "$1" ]; then
METHOD="$1" METHOD="$1"
else else
METHOD='by-path' METHOD='by-path'
fi fi
case "$METHOD" in case "$METHOD" in
by-path) by-path)
if [ -z "$ID_PATH" ]; then if [ -z "$ID_PATH" ]; then
echo "$DEVPATH not supported by path_id. by-id may work." >& echo "$DEVPATH not supported by path_id. by-id may work." >
2 &2
exit 1 exit 1
fi fi
RULE="ENV{ID_PATH}==\"$ID_PATH\"" RULE="ENV{ID_PATH}==\"$ID_PATH\""
;; ;;
by-id) by-id)
if [ "$ID_SERIAL" ]; then if [ "$ID_SERIAL" ]; then
RULE="ENV{ID_SERIAL}==\"$ID_SERIAL\"" RULE="ENV{ID_SERIAL}==\"$ID_SERIAL\""
elif [ "$ID_MODEL" -a "$ID_REVISION" ]; then elif [ "$ID_MODEL" -a "$ID_REVISION" ]; then
RULE="ENV{ID_MODEL}==\"$ID_MODEL\", ENV{ID_REVISION}==\"$ID_ RULE="ENV{ID_MODEL}==\"$ID_MODEL\", ENV{ID_REVISION}==\"$ID
REVISION\"" _REVISION\""

&2 >&2
exit 1 exit 1
fi fi
;; ;;
*) *)

exit 1 exit 1
;; ;;
esac esac
# Prevent concurrent processes from modifying the file at the same time. # Prevent concurrent processes from modifying the file at the same time.
lock_rules_file lock_rules_file
# Check if the rules file is writeable. # Check if the rules file is writeable.
choose_rules_file choose_rules_file
link_num=$(find_next_available 'cdrom[0-9]*') link_num=$(find_next_available 'cdrom[0-9]*')
match="SUBSYSTEM==\"block\", ENV{ID_CDROM}==\"?*\", $RULE" match="SUBSYSTEM==\"block\", ENV{ID_CDROM}==\"?*\", $RULE"
comment="$ID_MODEL ($ID_PATH)" comment="$ID_MODEL ($ID_PATH)"

[ "$ID_CDROM_CD_R" -o "$ID_CDROM_CD_RW" ] && \ [ "$ID_CDROM_CD_R" -o "$ID_CDROM_CD_RW" ] && \
write_rule "$match" "cdrw$link_num" write_rule "$match" "cdrw$link_num"
[ "$ID_CDROM_DVD" ] && \ [ "$ID_CDROM_DVD" ] && \
write_rule "$match" "dvd$link_num" write_rule "$match" "dvd$link_num"
[ "$ID_CDROM_DVD_R" -o "$ID_CDROM_DVD_RW" -o "$ID_CDROM_DVD_RAM" ] && \ [ "$ID_CDROM_DVD_R" -o "$ID_CDROM_DVD_RW" -o "$ID_CDROM_DVD_RAM" ] && \
